title: Donec Alius Diei
description: DONEC ALIUS DIEI (Until Another Day) is an eclectic mixture of styles and themes from the pen of Laura Lamarca.Written from the heart, Laura explores a number of personal thoughts and feelings and in doing so, defines her own voice whilst evoking situations and emotions people will be able to relate to.Laura is a self-taught poet with global appeal who can write in any form or genre. She writes for herself and for her sanity & covers a whole spectrum of subjects. “Humanitarian poetry is where my heart, ears and eyes lie... yet my soul lies within me and that is where I write from.”
author: Laura Lamarca
